name: Home_2
description:
I wanted to make a simplistic game that was inspired by crayon scribbles and drawings. While the game itself is simple in appearance, I wanted to convey the struggles that one has to endure in order to get back home safely. Of course the meaning of the objects are up to interpretation or they could be meant literally, it's all up to the player! :-)

Try to get the stick figure back home! The red heart shrinks the character initially but afterwards the red hearts help the character grow bigger 

Press S to start

Press ESC to end

Use the left and right arrows to move

Press the spacebar to jump
